course_title: Special Topics in Biology: Evolution &Impact Climate Chg.
class_notes:
Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from June 17 - July 22, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
Topic:   Evolution and Impact of Climate Change on Endemic Ecosystems.
course_description: A course on topics of special biological interest, designed for Biology majors elective credit. This course is repeatable when the topic varies.
prerequisites: (BIOL 142 and BIOL 142L) or BIOL_OX 142 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2271, Section #: 900, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: M. Reyes, Status: Open
